description:
Experience 4-piston stopping power and still have money left over for a lift ticket or two. If you can handle a little extra weight and don’t need free stroke adjustment, the SLX BR-M7120 give you all the benefits of the pricier XT brakes. With 4-pistons on each caliper, you get serious stopping power and excellent brake modulation.

  • Uses an in-line master cylinder for lightness and an easier bleed process
  • Tool-free reach adjustment for dialing on-the-fly
  • Servo Wave technology means plenty free-running pad clearance with great feedback on contact
  • Calipers feature 4 ceramic pistons for stopping power, great for heavier riders and heavier bikes (e-bikes)
  • Comes with finned, heat-reducing Ice Technologies pads for excellent heat tolerance
  • Uses mineral oil as a hydraulic fluid, so non-toxic, non-corrosive and easy to work with
name: Shimano SLX BR-M7120 4 Piston Hydraulic Disc Brake
